publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4064.3 Tommy Sheridan: Closing the Opportunity Gap for Older People-As an amendment to motion (S1M-4064) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "notes that four years of Labour rule in Scotland and six in United Kingdom have left many pensioners still in poverty; calls on Her Majesty's Government to raise pensions to Â£150 a week, reduce pension age to 60 and restore the link to earnings, and calls on the Scottish Executive to adopt a Senior Citizens' Charter that should include the following; abolition of rents for all pensioners in public rented accommodation, including sheltered housing, purchase of fuel vouchers to provide free fuel for pensioners between October and April and vouchers for free telephone installation and standing charges, purchase of TV licences for all pensioners and the provision of free travel for pensioners on public transport throughout Scotland."
